#include<iostream>
#define N 100000
using namespace std;
int k_s_1(int val[],int wt[],int n,int W)
{
	if(W==0)
	 return 0;
	 int max=9999999;
	 for(int i=0;i<n;i++)
	  {
	   if(wt[i]<=W)
	   {
	   	    int res=val[i]+k_s_1(val,wt,n,W-wt[i]);
	   	    if(res<max)
	   	    {
	   	    	max=res;
	   	    }
	   }
     }
     return max;	      
}
int k_s(int val[],int wt[],int n,int W)
{
	      int m[N];
	      m[0]=0;
	      for(int i=1;i<=W;i++)
	       {
	       	   int max=100000000;
	       	   for(int j=0;j<n;j++)
	       	   {
	       	   	   if(wt[j]<=i)
	       	   	    {
	       	   	    	 int q=val[j]+m[i-wt[j]];
	       	   	    	 if(q<max)
	       	   	    	 max=q;
	       	   	    }
	       	   }
	       	   m[i]=max;
	       }
	     /*  for(int i=0;i<=W;i++)
	        printf("%d ",m[i]);
	        printf("\n");*/
	       return m[W];
}
int main()
 {
 	   int T;
 	   cin>>T;
 	   while(T--)
 	   {
 	   int n,W1,W2;
 	     cin>>W1>>W2;
 	   cin>>n;
 	 
 	   int W=W2-W1;
 	   int wt[N],val[N];
 	   for(int i=0;i<n;i++)
 	   cin>>val[i]>>wt[i];
 	   int res=k_s(val,wt,n,W);
 	   if(res!=100000000)
 	   {
 	   printf("The minimum amount of money in the piggy-bank is %d.\n",res);
       }
       else
       {
       	  printf("This is impossible.\n");
       }
      }
 	   return 0;
 	   
 }
